entries.m_sorry: I can't offer any payment. If you can talk them out of it, wonderful. Otherwise, I'm resigned to it.
entries.m_betrayed: You... you're letting them kill me? Just like that? Of all the heartless... you know what, to heck with non-violence. YOU deserve to be beat up.
entries.a_no_progress: I'm not in the mood for an interferin' fool stickin' their nose in private business.
entries.a_tired_waiting: I hate ta do this... you were a friend of ours, before. But it's time. C'mon, everybody. Attack!
entries.a_brushoff: You want a reward? A REWARD? You realize this was a friend of ours? Someone we killed only because they broke their solemn word? I have half a mind ta beat you up... get outta here and leave us be.
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: I already said thanks to ya, and that's enough. No, ya can't join the gang, we're full up plus you like talkin' too much.
entries.a_negotiate_fail: What a waste o' time. Let's kill the oathbreaker.
entries.a_waiting: Time's movin' along here... we got swoops ta ride and credits to steal, so let's get on with it.
entries.a_greet_mad: What, are you another one of these pacifist types? Yer in the wrong place at the wrong time!
entries.minion_5: I say we chop his head off anyway.
entries.minion_4: Once in the gang, always in the gang!
entries.minion_3: Do we really have ta do this?
entries.a_thank_negotiate: I'm glad we didn't have to kill after all. Tell the truth, we usually just rough folks up a bit, take mone credits, ya know? And killin' a former friend... well, it felt wrong.
entries.a_thank_combat: Well, that's an oath satisfied. I'm glad ya know the meanin' of honor, stranger.
entries.a_respond_m_1: All high 'n' mighty now are we? You never seemed to mind before. I know, you say ye've changed. That's a load of bantha poodoo if you ask me.
entries.m_greet_a: I'm sorry, but I can't keep on beating up peaceful people for money. It just doesn't feel right anymore.
entries.a_greet_m: There ya are! You can't just walk away from us that way! You swore a sacred oath, and you know the penalty for breakin' your word!
entries.m_waiting: Well, they should be here soon. They knew where I was going--I practically told them when I left.
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Thank you so much! I would have just laid down and died for them, I suppose. But I would have died knowing I did the right thing.
entries.response_negotiate: Can we talk about this before any blood is shed?
entries.m_negotiate_greet: Do I need to prepare myself to die now?
entries.a_accept_offer: Never hurt anyone, huh? You WOULD be useless. Even more useless than now.
entries.a_decline_offer: That's not near enough to satisfy th' demands of a blood oath.
entries.m_no_negotiate: I will not violate my beliefs. Violence is evil.
entries.m_will_negotiate: What if I take a second oath to never hurt anyone? Would you leave me alone then? I' still be a member, just... useless to you.
entries.a_no_negotiate: An oath is an oath. Get out of the way.
entries.a_maybe: If yer thinkin' of persuadin' us not to kill the oathbreaker, then you better start talkin' fast.
entries.a_yes: Get on out of here, then. We'll settle this amongst ourselves.
entries.a_no: Look, oathbreakers don't deserve to live. You'll regret making this choice.
entries.m_maybe: Well, maybe they'll have a change of heart. I doubt it though.
entries.a_greet_imperial: Yer hiding out with the Empire, eh? Well, even Imperial law has gotta give way to a forsworn oathbreaker!
entries.a_greet_rebel: Hidin' with a fellow Rebel won't do ya any good! We all hate the Empire, but that's nothin' compared to breakin' a sworn blood oath!
entries.m_thank_combat: Did you really have to start a fight? I told you, I'm giving up violence. Everywhere I go, I'm surrounded by thugs. Get away from me.
entries.m_no: That's OK. I'm resigned to it.
entries.m_yes: Well, I used to belong to a swoop gang. I've decided that's no life for me--too violent and anarchistic. But they say that once you join, you're in for life. So since I quit, my former friends are coming to kill me. Goes to show that they're not the sort of group I want to belong to! You want to try to talk them out of it?
entries.a_greet: There's our little friend. Now it's time to show what happens when people abandon our gang!
entries.m_greet: Hello there. You may want to leave, there's going to be a fight. I'll probably be killed.
